</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 157</row>

**Price** 360 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Pepperbox](/Weapons.aspx?ID=205)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This dubious weapon gets its name from the fact that it's typically crafted with multiple false barrels so that it's more difficult for enemies to predict the weapon's angle of fire from the four working barrels. Most of the time, this gun functions as a _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [pepperbox](/Weapons.aspx?ID=205)_ with [capacity 4](/Traits.aspx?ID=399) instead of capacity 3, albeit one with a complicated loading mechanism involving rotating the barrels. In a pinch though, all four of the real barrels can be fired simultaneously.
